a.seq, a.concertType, a.concertTitle, a.concertDetailText, a.delNy, a.defaultNy, a.memberSeq, b.concertZipCode, b.concertAddress, b.concertAddressDetail, c.concertDate, c.concertDateTime, (SELECT e.name FROM concertCasting e WHERE 1=1 AND e.seq = d.concertCasting_seq ) as name, c.seq as concertDateSeq
